General.Name: Dixie Lee International Industries Inc
General.Description: Dixie Lee International Industries, Inc. engages in the franchising business in Canada and internationally. It searches franchise candidates to develop multiple unit restaurants. The company was founded in 1964 and is based in Kingston, Canada.
General.Address: 559 Princess Street, Kingston, ON, Canada, K7L 1C8
